ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: For those who have taqwa there is triumph:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the state of triumph awaits the God-fearing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pious ones will be triumphant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the place of success is for the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, for those who have Taqwa, there will be a success;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely for those who guard (against evil) is achievement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely for the godfearing awaits a place of security,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! for the duteous is achievement -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As for those who are mindful of God, they shall surely triumph:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily for the God-fearing is an achievement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed a triumph awaits the Godwary:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart's) desires;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, for the Muttaqun, there will be a success (Paradise);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, for the cautious a place of prosperity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But for the righteous there is triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:31]   Truly for the God-fearing there will be a triumph, a place of triumph, in Paradise:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! for the duteous) for those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies (is achievement) safety from the Fire and nearness of Allah
